div.p: The following graphs shows the full structure and relationships of the artifacts in the Breast Radiology Profile Implementation Guide.

There are three graphs showing the three different levels of detail that this IG implements. There is a graph showing a) the basic elements, the basic and enhanced elements, and the basic, enhanced, and comprehensive elements..
The basic level of detail includes the most common elements that must be included to be considered a 'basic' level of report.
Click on any of the elements of the graph to go to a section describing that element.
The enhanced level of detail includes the basic elements and adds enhanced elements to further detail the report. All these elements be included to be considered an 'enhanced' level of report.
Click on any of the elements of the graph to go to a section describing that element.

The comprehensive level of detail includes all the elements in this Implementation Guide to completely detail the report. All these elements be included to be considered an 'comprehensive' level of report.
Click on any of the elements of the graph to go to a section describing that element.
